definition: emptiness/void/abstract theory or guiding principles/empty or unoccupied/diffident or timid/false/humble or modest/(of health) weak/virtual/in vain
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: False, that is exaggerated, insincere, courteously but without sincerity, cover-up.
sentences.chinese: 假，就是誇大其詞，言不由衷，虛與委蛇，文過飾非。
